thread.section_title: Hotel De Petris - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Basic indeed - Review
thread.title_full: Basic indeed - Review of Hotel De Petris, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: Holly S
title: Basic indeed - Review
text:
Reception awful
Keys on a cheap plastic fob which reflects the standard
Stayed in annexe building which was scarey given I was a lone traveller
Had to find lights navigate myself around the place
Security poor in door
But there is a good sturdy safe
Wanted to check out but could not find alternative
Not pleasant
Sheets clean
Pillows terrible like stones
Hot water started up after 15 mins
Hurray
Time for refurb and get rid of that receptionist she looks soooo bored
Do not book this unless you can get it for pennies
